title: SparkCluster 2.2 - Zeppelin 0.7.3
description: Spark 2.2 cluster with Zeppelin 0.7.3 Notebook editor
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.2 with Tensorflow and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.7.3.

title: SparkCluster 2.3 - Jupyter 5.4.0 - Python 3.6.4
description: Spark 2.3 cluster with Jupyter 5.4.0 Notebook editor for Python 3.6.4
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.3 with Python 3.6.4, Tensorflow and Keras enabled together with Jupyter 5.4.0 and PixieDust 1.1.9

title: SparkCluster 2.3 - Zeppelin 0.8 (snapshot) - Python 2.7
description: Spark 2.3 cluster with Zeppelin 0.8 compiled from sources Notebook editor with Python 2.7
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.3 with Python 2.7, Tensorflow 1.7 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.8 (snapshot)

title: SparkCluster 2.3 - Zeppelin 0.8 (snapshot) - Python 3.6 - LDAP
description: Spark 2.3 cluster with Zeppelin 0.8 compiled from sources with Python 3.6.4
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.3 with Python 3.6, Tensorflow 1.7 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.8 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.
